crashrpt
A crash reporting system for Windows applications

CrashRpt Documentation

Introduction to CrashRpt

This section covers the following topics:

  • Getting Started page describes CrashRpt library's mission and main features.

  • Architecture Overview page describes the main components of CrashRpt: the components designed for error reporting and components designed for error report analysis.

  • About an Error Report page tells about what error report files are, when they are created and what data they contain.

  • Demo Applications page describes some demo applications included in CrashRpt distribution. You can refer to those apps for examples of CrashRpt usage.

  • Frequently Asked Questions page contains the questions and answers about CrashRpt usage. Read this page for quick start.

  • Change Log page contains change history between versions of CrashRpt. Read this page to learn what's new in the current version.

  • Authors page contains the list of people who contributed into CrashRpt project development.
